synopsis.text: Starâ˜†Twinkle Precure embarks on a cosmic adventure when a mysterious, star-shaped alien known as UMA crash-lands into Lala's gummy case. As the girls form a unique bond with UMA through their shared love of music, they soon discover that this enigmatic creature holds immense importance to the universe. However, danger lurks as ruthless alien hunters threaten to capture UMA, putting the entire galaxy in peril. With the fate of the universe hanging in the balance, the Precures must harness the power of song to protect UMA and defeat the relentless hunters in this interstellar battle filled with courage, friendship, and melody.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
